fullText:
Vestige Adept

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlock, Vestige Pact class feature
Benefit: When your vestige pact boon is triggered, as a free action you can choose to change your active vestige to any other vestige that has been an active vestige for you since your last short rest or extended rest.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 130.
name: Vestige Adept
benefit: When your vestige pact boon is triggered, as a free action you can choose to change your active vestige to any other vestige that has been an active vestige for you since your last short rest or extended rest.
